derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from Old French, of unknown origin

entry.def: A roan is a horse that is brown or black with some white hairs.

means.word_mean: 1. a soft sheepskin leather that is colored and finished to resemble morocco; used in bookbinding
